Text: Converting from epub to pdf usually doesn't make much sense. Calibre does it, but not well. Most of the books in this torrent are easily available elsewhere in pdf or plain text or html. Better to just find them in those formats and use a pdf printer if you really want pdf. Or just download an epub reader (there's a Firefox extension that works well for this).

@ APARTHEIDisraeliSCUM

1.convert the epub to Lit format using Calibre (its free,just google it)

2.  then use the Lit file to get a Pdf using ABC Amber LIT Converter (its also free) - 

http://www.processtext.com/abclit.html
this method gives a better formatted Pdf when compared to Calibre.
There are some good ones and some truly awful books in here.
...and this is a much better collection: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6079899/
